pages.text: $(italic)Your new magic fishing rods have the interesting property of attracting even living creatures. Why that wasn't a thing with your boring rods? I don't know.$(br)With this enchantment, you can further increase the chance of catching living creatures.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Increases the chance to reel in living creatures when fishing.$(br2)Max Level: 3$(br)Applicable to Spectrum's Fishing Rods.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a common Book with Big Catch by surrounding your Enchanter with Pigment and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Big Catch from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.$(br)This price will quickly increase to more and more Pigment and Experience for each additional level.
